@zkgillispie I'm still 3,000 miles from my Xbox. Try this weekend bud.
My life is a giant Lord of the Rings reference in which I am Treebeard and I am pissed about orcs trying to burn the forests.
If you're feeling hopeless remember the hordes of Mordor had pushed to the upper levels of Minas Tirith before the forces of Rohan arrived.
@joshharrison_2 First they came for the steelers, then they came for the Steelers.
@joshharrison_2 Furthers my suspicion that Brady is an android designed to play football.

@big_tjones Botany was never my strong point.
Whether you happily identify with one of those groups or not, is that really the company you want to keep?
Regardless of your reasons, you've found yourself in the same camp as Nazis, racists, homophobes, xenophobes, and actual monsters.
If you're still supporting this administration I'm going to need you to REALLLLYY think that one through.
The hair in the wind though.

Patiently waiting for the executive order to prevent NASA and NOAA from publishing climate information because I WOULD NOT BE SURPRISED.
The Force Awakens the Last Jedi to Go Make Sure the Front Door is Locked.
This one hit home. https://t.co/ABEMT7zoAT
@roshaniel21 Who did this
@T_royWizzle I'm wondering how that level of shadiness doesn't at least make you raise an eyebrow?
@T_royWizzle And with tax returns the concern is much less tax evasion and more about who he is financially involved with.
@T_royWizzle It raises the question of, "Okay, what ELSE could/would/are they lie/lying about?"
@T_royWizzle The worry here isn't about crowd sizes, it's about why an administration would feel inclined to lie about something so silly?
Also I have a lot of other points I'd love for you to clear up for me so if we can just have a big chat that would be great.
Because, as a concerned American citizen, I'm curious as to how/why you're okay with both of those things.
So, Republican/right wing friends, please explain your views on "alternative facts" and not releasing tax returns. https://t.co/Bd9uVD9Luj
I'm beginning to commandeer Florida friend's friends and make them my friends which is my friendly plot to befriend more friends.
My response to the idea of withdrawing from the U.N. https://t.co/5BLnOmPSSs
@deanna__boyer Greed is a funny thing.
I found a map store in Seattle I'm never leaving.
Seattle. #WomensMarch https://t.co/GRkOIMocPi
"West Virginia is just beautiful. Truly. Richmond is such a beautiful city." - @POTUS
I will not abandon my planet to the short-sighted, greed driven whims of a group that refuses to inform themselves.
This administration will take every measure possible to suppress the truth about climate change which means we need to work harder.
777 engines are really, really big.
The first time was in the NASA mockup facility and people thought we were astronauts and were waving and taking pictures of us.
Today was the 2nd time I've taken a tour of a facility that got me down in the action as the casuals watched from the catwalks above.
I'm at the Boeing factory walking around the assembly lines and trying to stay out of the way of the workers but I'm also like YO PLANES THO
Okay here we are. End of the road. How many guns did Obama take? Looking for a final tally here.
So tomorrow Donald Trump takes the same oath of office that I took but the difference is that I intend to actually uphold it.
@MesseLynn I will fight you.
Tomorrow I get to see Boeing airplanes being built in the factory and I am STOKED.
Apricot cider is the best cider.
I'm 3 hours behind most of you so if you've made a mistake today let me know THERE MIGHT STILL BE TIME I CAN FIX EVERYTHING.
They're supposedly very intelligent but I've never seen any evidence of it. https://t.co/0ScJVeMYPE
Whenever I get worried that I made the wrong choice not working for NASA I remind myself that an astronaut told me I made a good decision.

Betsy DeVos is, in four words, "one of the worst."
For the rest of the worst, please reference the Trump administration.
A year ago I released a single and there's still no EP WHAT AM I DOING?
So when you talk about that, that's what I picture in my head. I'll also remind you Sauron was the bad guy.
Drilling for fossil fuels in national parks? I'll remind you the forces of Sauron wanted to burn Middle Earth to fuel the fires of industry.
Having @NOAAClimate favorite this assures me that I AM DOING A GOOD THING.
I'm going to keep sharing climate information forever and you won't stop me. https://t.co/k02AwqXGY2
@ddryan @thejohnterry who
Seattle is rainy. As expected.
@donscafonius This is a great gif.
Me and my engineering power level after I finish this class: https://t.co/9AjHK6jhoH
@angyotensin They're a wild bunch.
I'm in a class with people from interesting places such as Japan, Lebanon, Kuwait, Ireland, Chile, and Oklahoma.
As evidenced when I met them Friday and they said "Oh so you're Astro Nick."
Apparently a Florida friend has been referring to me as "Astro Nick" to his work friends without even knowing about me being TheAstroNick.
12:01pm, January 20th, 2017. https://t.co/ZQCoidCJeL
That's not how you spell "ethical." https://t.co/7i7JM4JvZt
Hello I am in Seattle.
Convinced there's nothing in Denver other than the airport. There's nothing in any direction. Just flat, cold, barren landscape.
Dude traded me his window seat for my middle seat so he could sit beside his wife. I've never been so thankful for the concept of love.
Let's swap "presentable" with "professional" because my sneakers, jeans, and Black Keys t-shirt are absolutely presentable.
You have to pack more for long term journeys for work because you actually have to be presentable sometimes.
@SpenserWempe I'm just making sure we explore all theoretically possible scenarios here.
@SpenserWempe What if Korean guy BECAME a Dutch guy in the night?

GO WEST, YOUNG MAN.
So they say.
Today I travel farther west than I ever have before.
Need to be at the airport around 6:45am. Lots of flying tomorrow. Should I just power through and sleep on the flights?
Whyyyyyyyyy weren't we doing this already? https://t.co/AY6KR96oIJ
@kelsmonty Especially on my phone. It's a nightmare.
@DHunt_ Also this has been a really good back and forth and you should never feel bad about being THAT guy because I appreciate THAT guy.
@DHunt_ I disagree, but only regarding environmental regulations. Back to the point, Clean Air Act had no effect on air pollution levels?
@DHunt_ I'm pretty sure clean air and water benefits everyone.
